body_html:
@apaszke @ezyang and I had offline discussions, here is how we are going to move forward:

  1. put these tests into a separate directory, test/onnx
  2. change the model exports tests to only do verify on the trace and the onnx models

I will do the refactoring (aka 2. above) in onnx-fb-universe first and then create another PR here to put them into test/onnx.
body_text:
@apaszke @ezyang and I had offline discussions, here is how we are going to move forward:

put these tests into a separate directory, test/onnx
change the model exports tests to only do verify on the trace and the onnx models

I will do the refactoring (aka 2. above) in onnx-fb-universe first and then create another PR here to put them into test/onnx.
body:
@apaszke @ezyang and I had offline discussions, here is how we are going to move forward:

1. put these tests into a separate directory, test/onnx
2. change the model exports tests to only do `verify` on the trace and the onnx models

I will do the refactoring (aka 2. above) in onnx-fb-universe first and then create another PR here to put them into `test/onnx`.
